00001 /* Version: mss_v5_3_1_13561 */
00002 /*
00003  * aes_eax.h
00004  *
00005  * AES-EAX Implementation
00006  *
00007  * Copyright Mocana Corp 2006-2007. All Rights Reserved.
00008  * Proprietary and Confidential Material.
00009  *
00010  * The EAX mode of operation is not tied to the AES
00011  * cipher, it can be used with any cipher, but this
00012  * implementation does not parameterize the cipher
00013  * used, since AES is only used for this mode currently.
00014  * "Do the simplest thing that works".
00015  *
00016  */
00017 
00018 
00019 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00020 
00021 #ifndef __AES_EAX_HEADER__
00022 #define __AES_EAX_HEADER__
00023 
00024 #ifdef __cplusplus
00025 extern "C" {
00026 #endif
00027 
00028 typedef struct AES_EAX_Ctx
00029 {
00030     AES_CTR_Ctx             aesCTRCtx;      /* used for encryption */
00031     AES_OMAC_Ctx            headerOMAC;         /* tweak = 1 */
00032     AES_OMAC_Ctx            cipherOMAC;         /* tweak = 2 */
00033     ubyte                   N[AES_BLOCK_SIZE];  /* OMAC of the nonce */
00034 } AES_EAX_Ctx;
00035 
00036 /*------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00037 
00038 /*  Exposed Function prototypes  */
00039 /* AES EAX -- cf original article for explanation  */
00040 /* This API support online processing of data
00041 i.e. after AES_EAX_init has been called, AES_EAX_updateHeader and
00042 AES_EAX_encryptMessage (AES_EAX_decryptMessage) can be called multiple
00043 time and in any order. To get the tag (MAC), the final call should be
00044 AES_EAX_final. */
00045 MOC_EXTERN MSTATUS AES_EAX_init(MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx) const ubyte* keyMaterial,
00046                                 ubyte4 keyLength,
00047                                 const ubyte* nonce,
00048                                 ubyte4 nonceLength,
00049                                 AES_EAX_Ctx* pCtx);
00050 MOC_EXTERN MSTATUS AES_EAX_updateHeader(MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx) const ubyte* headerData,
00051                                     sbyte4 dataLength,
00052                                     AES_EAX_Ctx* pCtx);
00053 MOC_EXTERN MSTATUS AES_EAX_encryptMessage(MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx) ubyte* msgData,
00054                                        sbyte4 msgLen, AES_EAX_Ctx* pCtx);
00055 #define AES_EAX_decryptMessage AES_EAX_encryptMessage /* encrypt and decrypt are the same */
00056 MOC_EXTERN MSTATUS AES_EAX_final(MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx) ubyte tag[/*tagLen*/],
00057                                         sbyte4 tagLen, AES_EAX_Ctx* pCtx);
00058 
00059 /* For decryption/tage verification, 2 workflows:
00060  0) (common) AES_EAX_init
00061  Workflow a:
00062  1a) call AES_EAX_updateHeader AES_EAX_decryptMessage multiple time and in any order
00063  this will also get the plain text
00064  2a) call AES_EAX_final to get the tag and compare it with the provided tag
00065  Workflow b:
00066  1b) call AES_EAX_generateTag to get the tag and compare it with the provided tag
00067  2b) if the tag was verified call AES_EAX_getPlainText to get the plain text
00068  multiple calls are possible  to this function. AES_EAX_decrypt can also be called
00069  but is less efficient. In workflow b) AES_EAX_final should not be called: it will not
00070  give the correct result */
00071 
00072 MOC_EXTERN MSTATUS AES_EAX_generateTag( MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx)
00073                                    const ubyte* cipherText, sbyte4 cipherLen,
00074                                    const ubyte* header, sbyte4 headerLen,
00075                                    ubyte tag[/*tagLen*/], sbyte4 tagLen,
00076                                    AES_EAX_Ctx* pCtx);
00077 
00078 MOC_EXTERN MSTATUS AES_EAX_getPlainText(  MOC_SYM(hwAccelDescr hwAccelCtx)
00079                                     ubyte* cipherText, sbyte4 cipherLen,
00080                                     AES_EAX_Ctx* pCtx);
00081 #ifdef __cplusplus
00082 }
00083 #endif
00084 
00085 #endif /* __AES_CMAC_HEADER__ */
